Stone.name: Stone
Stone.description: A stone that can be thrown or be used to make something.

Glass Bottle.name: Glass Bottle
Glass Bottle.description: A glass bottle that is good for throwing.

Nail.name: Nail
Nail.description: Try hammering some of these into a baseball bat and take out a monster.

Leather.name: Leather
Leather.description: Are there any beasts around? Leather is versitile and can be used in tons of different ways.

Turtle Shell.name: Turtle Shell
Turtle Shell.description: Reminds me of a sandbox I had as a kid.

Rubber.name: Rubber
Rubber.description: A material that is always elastic. Unlike your cheeks, which lose elasticity day by day.

Scrap Metal.name: Scrap Metal
Scrap Metal.description: Very old, beat up metal. Can you craft a weapon out of this?

Lighter.name: Lighter
Lighter.description: The ability to make fire is key.

Laser Pointer.name: Laser Pointer
Laser Pointer.description: A useful addition when aiming weapons or pointing at the whiteboard. Made from a cell phone battery and a laser.

Stallion Medal.name: Stallion Medal
Stallion Medal.description: A form of identification that verifies the recognition of the royal order. There have been many cases where royalty have used this for inspection purposes.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.description: Would be good for a flashlight, remote control, or your beeping smoke detector.

Alcohol.name: Alcohol
Alcohol.description: Whenever you smell this, either a laboratory or a hospital might come to mind.

Oil.name: Oil
Oil.description: At room temperature, this fatty component exists in liquid form.

Cloth.name: Cloth
Cloth.description: Made by weaving fibers. Different thread types make different fabrics.

Gemstone.name: Gemstone
Gemstone.description: An unrefined gemstone. Could be worth something in the right hands.

Glue.name: Glue
Glue.description: Why doesn't it stick to itself in the bottle?

Iron Ore.name: Iron Ore
Iron Ore.description: Just the ore. Extract the iron to make it useful!

Gunpowder.name: Gunpowder
Gunpowder.description: Explosive powder. It goes in guns. Boom.

Steel.name: Steel
Steel.description: Just some strong steel. They could name a football team after this.

Oilcloth.name: Oilcloth
Oilcloth.description: Oiled cloth. May be needed for something involving fire.

Heated Oil.name: Heated Oil
Heated Oil.description: Heated oil. It was sometimes used as a thermal weapon in the past, but now mostly used for cooking.

Ruby.name: Ruby
Ruby.description: Rubies and sapphires actually have the same chemical composition and mineral structure! However, rubies have a small amount of chromium that makes them appear red.

Dead Battery.name: Dead Battery
Dead Battery.description: Is a dead battery still a battery? Just throw it at someone!

White Powder.name: White Powder
White Powder.description: Unidentifiable white powder. Probably from chalk...

Meteorite.name: Meteorite
Meteorite.description: A stone containing traces of alien vital force. It has mystical effects.

Piano Wire.name: Piano Wire
Piano Wire.description: Where did you find a piano?

Electronic Parts.name: Electronic Parts
Electronic Parts.description: You can likely craft something out of this.

Blueprint.name: Blueprint
Blueprint.description: An elaborate blueprint. What on earth do all the lines and numbers mean?

Iron Sheet.name: Iron Sheet
Iron Sheet.description: This will give you goosebumps if you scrape your fingernails across it.

Gold.name: Gold
Gold.description: Soft, valuable, and gorgeous. A must have for any piece of jewelery.

Tree of Life.name: Tree of Life
Tree of Life.description: A tree that accumulated a lot of vital force over a long time. Also known as the World Tree, it symbolizes the origin of the universe and the root of life.

Moon Stone.name: Moon Stone
Moon Stone.description: A jewel with a subdued shine.

Motor.name: Motor
Motor.description: A motor itself is useless, but you can probably turn it into something great.

Mithril.name: Mithril
Mithril.description: This silver metal has the best reaction to vital force. It was strengthened due to its long exposure to VF. Light as a feather, but stronger than steel.

Glass Panel.name: Glass Panel
Glass Panel.description: A glass panel used for a display. If you break the one on your TV, you gotta replace it with a new panel. At that point, you might as well just get a new TV.

Ion Battery.name: Ion Battery
Ion Battery.description: A high capacity battery made of lithium ion that can be recharged many times.

VF Blood Sample.name: VF Blood Sample
VF Blood Sample.description: Only the strongest can get this blood sample.

Cell Phone.name: Cell Phone
Cell Phone.description: I'm not getting any bars here...

Force Core.name: Force Core
Force Core.description: This seems to hold untapped power.
